channel.title: Help with run server.bat
channel.description:
I get this error when I run my server:
exception in thread "main" [12/22/10 6:43 PM]: java.net.Bind Exception: Address already in use: bind at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind<Native Method> at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannellmpl.bind<ServerSocketC at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdapter.bind<ServerSocketAdapter or.java:59> at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew<SocketAcceptor.java:363> at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800<SocketAcceptor.java:55> at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run<SocketAcceptor.java:222> at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run<NamePreservingRunnble.java:51> at java.lang.Thread.run<Thread.java:662>

item.title: Help with run server.bat
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nts253 Anc13nts253
item.description:
@Anc13nts253 wrote:

[quote=“Woopzpkedu, post:6, topic:374563”][quote author=Code kai link=topic=470532.msg3440637#msg3440637 date=1293064452]
How do I change it?
[/quote]change the ip[/quote]
It’s already in use, end the Java processes that are using the Port. No need to change the IP.

Read full topic
